Package gameClasses

Class ToolValidity

java.lang.Object
gameClasses.ToolValidity
public class ToolValidity extends Object
This class helps verify the validity of certain actions the player can perform. Each method returns an integer value that corresponds to a specific error message.

      public int validatePlant(State[] adjacentTiles, State state, Plant plant, float playerCoins)
      Validates the plant action.
      Parameters:
      adjacentTiles - the states of the adjacent tiles to the tile the player is trying to plant
      state - the state of the tile the player is trying to plant
      plant - the plant the player is trying to plant
      playerCoins - the coins of the player
      Returns:
      an integer value that corresponds to a specific error message

      harvestDays - the harvest days of the plant the player is trying to harvest

    • validateWater

      public int validateWater(State state, int waterCount, int waterMax, int bonus)
      Validates the water action.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the tile the player is trying to water
      waterCount - the water count of the plant the player is trying to water
      waterMax - the water max of the plant the player is trying to water
      bonus - the water bonus of the player's farmer type
      Returns:
      an integer value that corresponds to a specific error message

    • validateFert

      playerCoins - the coins of the player

      fertMax - the fertilize max of the plant the player is trying to fertilize
      bonus - the fertilize bonus of the player's farmer type
      Returns:
      an integer value that corresponds to a specific error message
